Enjoy dramatic readings of three recent ACLU cases by SCOTUS Theater.
 ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌  ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌  ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌  ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌  ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌  ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌  ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌

Dear ##SM_RULE_360 Email Salutation##,

You're invited to enjoy dramatic readings of three recent ACLU cases by SCOTUS Theater, followed by a conversation with ACLU staff about our liberties and our courts. Join us in Redwood City, on Thursday, October 24 or in San Francisco on Monday, December 2.

Both events will begin with drinks and hors d'oeuvres at 6 p.m. followed by SCOTUS Theater readings at 7 p.m.

RSVP by October 17 for the Redwood City event and we’ll see you at the San Mateo County History Museum.

RSVP by November 22 for the San Francisco event and we’ll see you at the San Francisco War Memorial.

Both venues are wheelchair accessible and real-time captioning will be provided. Parking and transit information provided upon RSVP.

We look forward to seeing you there,

ACLU of Northern California
